title: Cuemon.Integrity
description: The Cuemon.Integrity assembly is a member of the Cuemon .NET Core family and provides a way to represent cacheable data-centric content that can be validated by cache-aware applications.
copyright: Copyright Â© Weubphoria 2009-2017. All rights reserved.

packOptions.summary: A free and flexible assembly family, built to extend and boost your codebelt - providing vast ways of possibilities for all breeds of coders, programmers, developers and the likes thereof.
packOptions.releaseNotes: The .NET Platform Standard release of the ported Cuemon .NET Framework.
